name: BNNS.FusedTernaryArithmeticParameters
desc: A structure that contains the parameters for a fused ternary arithmetic layer.

items.name: init(inputADescriptorType: BNNS.DescriptorType, inputBDescriptorType: BNNS.DescriptorType, inputCDescriptorType: BNNS.DescriptorType, outputDescriptorType: BNNS.DescriptorType, function: BNNS.ArithmeticTernaryFunction)
items.desc: Returns a new fused ternary arithmetic parameters structure.

items.name: var inputADescriptorType: BNNS.DescriptorType
items.desc: The descriptor type of the first input.

items.name: var inputBDescriptorType: BNNS.DescriptorType
items.desc: The descriptor type of the second input.

items.name: var inputCDescriptorType: BNNS.DescriptorType
items.desc: The descriptor type of the third input.

items.name: var outputDescriptorType: BNNS.DescriptorType
items.desc: The descriptor type of the output.
